values.ctor:
<init>()
            Constructs a ClassNotFoundException with no detail message.

<init>(s: String!)
            Constructs a ClassNotFoundException with the specified detail message.

<init>(s: String!, ex: Throwable!)
            Constructs a ClassNotFoundException with the specified detail message and optional exception that was raised while loading the class.

values.desc: Returns the exception that was raised if an error occurred while attempting to load the class.
